item.description: Join us for the BRITISH INVASION dance at the Dedham Hilton. The band, Britannia will play Classic Bristish Rock from the 60's and 70's. Dress is casual, hors d'oeuves, dessert, coffee/tea included, cash bar, free parking. Guests - $35.00 From 8pm to midnight.
item.how_to_find_us: Follow the music to the Ballroom
item.name: British Invasion Dance - June 20th- Dedham Hilton
